pages.text: A list of recipes that have been changed by TFC Artisanal.
Limewater has been renamed $(thing)Slaked Lime$(), and can now only be created using $(thing)Lime$(), not Flux.
Book and Quills are now crafted using Black Dye instead of an Ink Sac, and a $(l:tfc:artisanal/quillmaking)Quill$() rather than a feather.
Paper can now be made by bleaching Unrefined Paper in Lye, as well as by scraping it
Cake and Pumpkin Pie can now be made with all tfc sweeteners, including Artisanal's Perishable and Non-Perishable Sugars, as well as ArborFirmaCraft's Birch and Maple Sugars.
Cleaning dirty things in a water barrel now takes time and requires them to be sealed in the barrel.
Instantneous cleaning now requires the use of $(thing)Soapy Water$(). See $(l:tfc:artisanal/soap)Soap$().
